person.persName: John S. Hurt (Colonel of the 24th Kentucky Volunteer Regiment, U.S.A.)

body.p: Colonel of the 24th Kentucky Volunteer Regiment, U.S.A. Mustered into service on August 20, 1863 in Scott County, Tennessee. Mustered out on January 31, 1865.

bibl.p: Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort, KY: Kentucky Yeomen Office for John H. Harney, 1867), p. 164.
